title: Secret Invitation Letter
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>We finally completed the invitation letter to the secret sleepover!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I worked hard on the cipher.... I can’t wait for all the first years to see it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hey, who do you think will solve it first?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hmm.... Maybe Hanamaru-chan. She reads a lot of books and seems quite knowledgeable about ciphers.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Maki-san seems like she would be fast too. She’s trying to be a doctor and is really smart.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You’re right. But.... I have a feeling that Kasumi-chan might be first.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Sometimes, her intuitions are super sharp, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I can’t wait to see who will be the first to get it done. Rina-chan’s board「Excited」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Should we go put them in their mailboxes now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
